content: Fantastic utility. Really cuts down on the number of times I check my phone and allows very nice control over customizing notification behavior. The same rules are helpful and it takes some to experiment with new rules to see what works for you
Really nice app, if it had the ability to create custom notifications I could have completely replaced auto notification.
What just happened with the new update? Notifications aren't clickable from notification history and restore option disappeared as well.
Very useful. It works like a charm. One of the best applications in the play store.
Its an amazing app. I can now easily eliminate annoying notifications and set custom rules.
Best tool to manage notifications.

One of those rare perfect apps on the Play store. Extremely well designed, beautiful UI, and perfect for the job of customizing notifications. I've used another similar app before (Good Vibrations), but this one is lightyears ahead, both in functionality and design. Thanks for this quality piece of software, dear dev.
Already Great! Could be better if it has Notification Batch feature. üëçüèº

Had a couple of questions on how to use it at the start, but the dev was super helpful (hit Contact Support and send an email out) and helped me figure things out. Really appreciate how specific the app is, and what's possible with it, whether in blocking or whitelisting different types of notifications, and collating all of them (whether blocked or whitelisted) for future reference.
replyContent: Please press the contact support button at the top of settings as it will be much easier to explain it.

content: The app itself really is eye candy, it's so pleasing to look at, all the animations and colors fit perfectly. As for the apps functionality, it's works amazingly! Be sure to read each functions descriptions carefully so you can reach the desired outcome for each notification.

Just what I've been looking for to keep me on top of my notifications. No more forgotten meetings, messages or reminders. One request: for the "remind me" action, add the ability to customize the notification sound and/or vibration. I would like to set a louder/different sound to tell it apart from the original. Great work! Worth every penny! üëç

I moved to BuzzKill after the Daywise pricing being enabled. Haven't looked back since. It's a great app with limited scope which it executes very well and probably good above and beyond my expectations. All in all very satisfied with using it

I am using this app for about 1 month now i like it I usually use premade rules the one problem I find here was if you are a blind person and using a screen reader on your phone you couldn't create custom rules I hope the developers should fix this if that problem also get fixed I will change my rating to 5 stars
replyContent: Will look into this right away.

content: This app and Bouncer (from same developer) are in my Top 3 apps. So useful, their features should have been part of Android. The privacy focus is unmatched.

Setting the rules is highly tedious with a terrible UI that only looks fancy. I was searching for alternatives to Daywise and Spren when I stumbled onto this terrible option. This app does not even work most of time and gets killed by battery saver frequently even if exempted. The sadder part is Google Play does not refund this as it is not according to their policies. I have used other apps from this developer (like bouncer which I love and works perfectly), this app is just terrible.
replyContent: Sorry to hear that, everyone else seems to have quite a different experience. I always offer a refund for anyone who is unhappy with my apps. So please email help@samruston.co.uk and I'll refund you.

content: Really useful app for managing frequent notification that you want to see but when & how it suits you. Only suggestions would be to view the history as the default start page, & 5 or 10 second timeout to auto dismiss notification, useful for verbose apps like Malwarebytes. Other than that I'd highly recommend this. Really well done. Thanks

EXCELLENT EXCELLENT EXCELLENT. from all my heart. This person or this company makes the best applications I have ever seen. INTERFACE: 10/10. I will buy all the people that this person takes are super useful ‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è‚ù§Ô∏è.

Love the versatility of the app. However, some things take too long to set up. I would love to be able to set a rule which applies to all apps except certain messaging apps, and should apply to any apps I install in the future. Would also love it if the app picked up on certain "types" of notifications, e.g. suggestions for rules what apply to groups but not direct messages in messaging apps.
The filters, the actions, and the ease of use makes this my go to app for managing notifications.
Someone in my Android dev twitter feed reccomended this app and it's better than suggested! Visually and functionally this app is in another league and should be an instant purchase.

This is really a extraordinary app that will boost your productivity to a next level. It enriches the functionality of Android notification system and let you get control of what to see and what to emphasise, as well as a notification history to prevent you from missing any notices. In a word, this app is fabulous!

It worked really well in the beginning, now it won't recognise any of the rules, if i restart the device it works, then again after sometime notification which are supposed to be dismissed come up again, i tried locking the app in background but that also did not work. I feel like i wasted money on this app..After clicking on contact support, it gives option to share, but no contact person to share the logs with. FYI. I am using one plus 7, android version 10.
replyContent: Press Gmail and it will prefill an email. If that doesn't work then email help@samruston.co.uk directly

content: I'm sure the app is great but it didn't do what I wanted so after two days sought refund. Rejected.
replyContent: What's your email? I always give people a refund if they want one

content: The simple interface makes it easy to quickly create and implement rules. Imo, it's more efficient than going into the notification settings of a specific app to change notifications that you may decide you need later. I never knew I needed this app until I bought it during a sale. Now it's something I plan to use for years to come.
Want to select time frames for when the profiles are active. Donest work. Just sets to default times , not the ones I choose .
replyContent: Please press the contact support button in settings. This is the first time this has been reported and I will look into it for you right away.

content: Thank you! The amount of time this saves over time would be enormous if we find the correct patterns. Love it. I wish the app icons were visible on each rule in the list to identify a rule quickly. Also searching in the rule list would be good.

What a brilliant concept and execution. It's one of the most useful apps I have used ever. And so damn reliable! Sam Ruston really is one of the best app makers for Android (Flamingo for Twitter, the OG Weather Timeline, etc) are apps I still use to date. Thanks for the wonderful efforts.
Love this app
Please add batching functionality and maybe a persistent simple notification overview of batched notifications.

Using this app from half month but still not working. Not reacting however condition write & applied. I thought it may glitch or something which will be solved in coming updates, so i waited but nothing happening so now feel like this app not worth to spend money.
replyContent: Email help@samruston.co.uk and I'll look into what issue you're having.

content: Not working.
replyContent: Please email help@samruston.co.uk and I'll look into this for you

content: Thanks! Thanks! Thanks! this saves me a ton of time everyday. Now I don't need to unlock and press OK or Approve whenever I receive a notification from Authenticator app. The most useful app on the Play store, worth every penny
its a necessity i didnt know i needed
üëç
Love all Sam Ruston apps. Slick UI while being hyper-functional. What more could you want?
I love this app. And it keeps on getting better after each update. I really appreciate developer for giving us meaningful update in an app which is already pretty much perfect.
God hath spoken and he hath said "you should be able to have a notification cool down without rooting your phone"
This app makes it possible to set a custom sound and vibration pattern for any notification you may get. It is a life saver since Google killed Gmail label notifications.
This quickly became a must have APP for me. Highly recommend for anyone looking for a great way to manage your notifications. THANK YOU.

Beautiful. Looks effective. Would be 5 stars if the app provided more than 4 examples of custom rules. I need more context and starting suggestions. At least 10. This should be relatively easy to implement if I'm to believe all the positive reviews and would be invaluable for people like me that need a little more help. Thanks for any consideration.

Very useful notification manager that doesn't interfere with how Android handles notifications by default, works transparently in the background. Rule system and Tasker integration is what really sets it apart. I've tested a few different notification managers and this is so far the only one that doesn't seem to affect my phone's performance.
It's gotten much better since I first installed it on my phone so I deleted a previous review and I'm leaving this four out of five star review. I'll bump it to five with additional improvements.
This app can really enhance the android notifications! Another great tool from the developer üëçüòª And don't forget the great design!!!
Loved it :))
Hands down the best notification management app.
Most beautiful app of 2020. Sam strikes back.
Fast, powerful and beautiful‚Äîthe golden trinity. I've tried half a dozen notification managers, and this takes the crown!
I like the app, thank you. Could you please add an option for custom text size? Something like a compact view (or just smaller text) for history would help me read through everything faster.
I used Daywise for a long time until they changed to a subscription. This is much better and can do way more. If I had know this was the same dev as Bouncer, I'd have just tried it a long time ago.

The app is great and I use it extensively for my notification management. Although one thing that bothers me is not being able to view notification history in listed form. There is a slider thing which doesn't work as expected when multiple notifications come in short period of time.
The app is very good... But I wonder if its possible to create a rule having a person from my contacts list. (edit: I've been testing and it seems that, if I put the name of my contact it works)
One of the best apps for Android hands down. The sheer power you've have over notifications in such a small app is astounding. Once it's set up you forget it's even there and that's a good thing.

Was very happy to see it automatically reply and also does as described I had the app for over 3 weeks before review do wish it could use up to 3 or so reply to make more human touch in stead of one and I also have other app from this store and find he has a very good understanding of wat is needed in mobile phone very lovely thx üòò
Great, but won't restore all notifications, and can only restore a single time. Only loads half the time
replyContent: Please press the contact support button in the settings section. Let me know which notifications can't be restored

content: One serious flaw with muting notifications - If I get a notification from an App that was not muted at almost the same time when I get a notification from an App that was muted using Buzzkill, I don't get notified about the notification that's from that App that wasn't muted. EDIT: Apparently this is a flaw with how Android works. I've updated my rating but it'd be cool to have this feature. The app visually looks very good.
replyContent: Unfortunately this is a limitation of Android. The alternative would be playing both sounds, instead of playing neither, which is probably better here. I'll add it to my to-do list. Right now if you get the non-muted notification slightly after then it will work, but it won't if you get it slightly before.

content: Nice solution to fine-tuning my notifications.

Good intention & interface but backend implementation doesn't feel that good. It worked when I installed it..but after that it doesn't work. I have tried on OnePlus & Xiaomi devices. Please fix this. Your app is good otherwise.
replyContent: Please press the  contact support button in settings

content: Extra customization of notifications for any app is great!
Fantastic! Works great with minimal setup.

BuzzKill is brilliant and it has reduced distractions on my phone drastically. The current set of intelligence serves my usecase pretty nicely; I really appreciate the ability to automatically copy OTPs. Kudos to Sam for another great app.
This is a great time saver Create more apps...I will buy

Great app, deserves 5 stars. Please add a feature to bookmark certain notifications, so that they can be restored or used even after 7 days. And please can you make this app, to restore the notifications more than once. There is a particular notification that my device shows in two days, and I have the use for that notification almost every day. So please release these features too. Thank you.
Maybe this is too personal, but I have ADHD and I've been wanting something like this for such a long time. The fact that it's gorgeous and private is just perfection. Thank you!
Excellent app. Lifesaver. I only wish we could interact with the restored notifications more.
App is simple to use with a great interface. Fast reaponse from developer when you have issues. Would definitely reccomend!

I have used it for some weeks but am now uninstalling due to limitations in the rules. This app needs more complex rules and/or blacklists. I use it to open apps when I get notifications from certain people ... but it's a no go to have Buzzkill interrupt my car navigation or camera.
Beautiful UI, powerful tools for the perfect customisation and hidden feature: select view changes on whatsapp deleted message to view deleted message from history log
Bought this app straight away when i saw your name on it üòÜüëå
üêù Great App

Amazing app works perfectly Thanks dev.. is it possible to trigger android actions like turning off mobile data? As it is not linked to time and date i tried using remider app to get notification at specific time but i don't find an option to off it

Really useful and beautiful app, but here's some suggestions: - Why I can't restore older notifications? - Would be useful to show the notification date inside the card, it is showing only the time. - Why a 7 days history limit? - When searching for notifications via text it could consider the app name also instead of just the message content, this way dont have to go to 'summary' and visually search for the app. - Tapping the 'history' tab could scroll to top when I'm already in that tab.
Can you please make all my apps, Sam Ruston? Buzzkill is wonderful. I never knew I needed this, and now I couldn't live without it.

Very very well done. Thank you for adding things I have wanted :) if this is possible but with apps like Snapchat it would be awesome to have custom sounds for different friends which isn't possible. :)
replyContent: Already replied to your email but just in case anyone else is reading this comment. Undo gives you 10 seconds to read, tap on or restore a notification after you dismiss it.

content: Your ability to make consistently good apps scares me. Please make at least one bad app so I know you're a human.
This one is a brilliant app.

Promising app and nice UI as expected from the dev. I'll review this app again as I get into deeper. I was using Daywise app for a while but when I read their privacy policy I realized that they are collecting metadata and using Google analytics for targeted advertising. Let's see how Buzzkill plays out. Remember: "if you're not paying for something, you're not the customer; you're the product being sold".
One of the best app I've come across. Really helps in managing the notification spam. The dev is really nice too. 10/10 would recommend to buy.
Really cool app that has become an instant necessity
Another simple yet powerful app from one of the best devs!
Your apps always live upto the expectations. A well designed and easy to use app.
nice app , hope future can add "time" , example reply deferent message/or deferent rules based on time/date
Awesome app, nice concept, Tasker was hard to use but this app made it very easy. I would request developer to please add more features/options available.
An IFTTT for Android notifications. Now I'm stuck between BuzzKill and Filter Box. Both of them are elegant designed and so helpful.
